projectDescription: Creating a community garden with designated plots for local residents. The project includes the installation of irrigation systems, seating areas, and educational signage.

milestones.title: Project Planning and Design
milestones.description: Establish project team, Conduct site survey, Design garden layout including irrigation system, seating areas, and educational signage, Develop project budget, Secure necessary permits and approvals
milestones.paymentDetails: : 10% of the total project cost upon completion of this milestone

milestones.title: Procurement and Preparation
milestones.description: Procure necessary materials: plants, irrigation system materials, seating furniture, signage, Prepare site for development: clear area, level ground, mark plot boundaries
milestones.paymentDetails: : 20% of the total project cost upon completion of this milestone

milestones.title: Installation of Irrigation System
milestones.description: Install irrigation system according to garden layout, Test system to ensure all areas are adequately covered, Make necessary adjustments
milestones.paymentDetails: : 20% of the total project cost upon completion of this milestone

milestones.title: Garden Plot Development
milestones.description: Install garden plots according to design, Add soil and compost to each plot, Install plot markers
milestones.paymentDetails: : 20% of the total project cost upon completion of this milestone

milestones.title: Installation of Seating Areas and Educational Signage
milestones.description: Install seating areas as per design, Install educational signage at designated spots
milestones.paymentDetails: : 20% of the total project cost upon completion of this milestone

milestones.title: Project Completion and Handover
milestones.description: Conduct final inspection, Make any necessary adjustments, Handover project to community with complete documentation
milestones.paymentDetails: : 10% of the total project cost upon completion of this milestone
